title: Visual Bug (Mecha Kha'Zix Claws - Unevolved)
body:
This is a VISUAL bug only. The problem is Kha'Zix claws; they should look different - this problem only persists BEFORE claws are evolved. 

In the link provided; the circles show how the claws should look, the center picture shows what Kha'Zix looks like on live.

http://imgur.com/iZVSEOq
